mapper.select: select env.id as envId, env.name as envName, env.status as envStatus, env.sort_id as envSortId, host.host as hostHost, env.zk_id as zkId, server.name as zkName, server.port as zkPort, host.host as zkHost from host left join env on host.env_id = env.id left join server on env.zk_id = server.id where host.status != 0 and host.id=#{hostId}
